### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE threat_data (
    threat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_name VARCHAR(100),
    threat_description TEXT,
    threat_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE affected_systems (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(100),
    system_type VARCHAR(50),
    threat_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (threat_id) REFERENCES threat_data(threat_id)
);

CREATE TABLE defense_measures (
    measure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    measure_name VARCHAR(100),
    measure_description TEXT,
    threat_id INT,
    system_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (threat_id) REFERENCES threat_data(threat_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES affected_systems(system_id)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM threat_data WHERE threat_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE threats (
  threat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  threat_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  threat_level INT,
  threat_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE threat_actors (
  actor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  actor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  actor_type VARCHAR(50),
  actor_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerability (
  vulnerability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vulnerability_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  vulnerability_description TEXT,
  threat_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (threat_id) REFERENCES threats(threat_id)
);

CREATE TABLE attack_methods (
  method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  method_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  method_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE,
  incident_description TEXT,
  threat_id INT,
  actor_id INT,
  vulnerability_id INT,
  method_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (threat_id) REFERENCES threats(threat_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (actor_id) REFERENCES threat_actors(actor_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (vulnerability_id) REFERENCES vulnerability(vulnerability_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (method_id) REFERENCES attack_methods(method_id)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM threats WHERE threat_id = 1;

### STATEMENT

DELETE threats, threat_actors FROM threats INNER JOIN threat_actors ON threats.threat_id = threat_actors.actor_id WHERE threats.threat_level > 5;

  threat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  threat_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  threat_level INT,
  threat_description TEXT
);

  actor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  actor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  actor_type VARCHAR(50),
  actor_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerability (
  vulnerability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

  vulnerability_description TEXT,

);

);

  FOREIGN KEY (threat_id) REFERENCES threats(threat_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (actor_id) REFERENCES threat_actors(actor_id),

  FOREIGN KEY (method_id) REFERENCES attack_methods(method_id)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM vulnerability WHERE vulnerability_id IN (SELECT vulnerability_id FROM incidents WHERE incident_date < '2022-01-01');
